verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] launched a stinging attack on former President Barack Obama , criticising his predecessor 's lack of action over ' so - called Russian meddling ' .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: launched] [ARG1: a stinging attack on former President Barack Obama] , [ARGM-ADV: criticising his predecessor 's lack of action over ' so - called Russian meddling '] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has launched a stinging attack on former President Barack Obama , [V: criticising] [ARG1: his predecessor 's lack of action over ' so - called Russian meddling '] .
President Donald Trump has launched a stinging attack on former President Barack Obama , criticising his predecessor 's lack of action over ' so - [V: called] [ARG2: Russian meddling] ' .
